author: damitha
msg: added sample axiscpp.conf file
and a conf directory where a sample server.wsdd is placed

author: susantha
msg: Fixed a bug in the generated code

author: stevel
msg: The core additional feature of this commit is that you can now set the timeout as a property on a Call object, so letting JAX-RPC client apps adjust it.
Also a couple of silentl swallowed exceptions/failures are now logged at debug level, though they could be raised to info easily as they are now i18n-ized.
Everything else is a combination of
-refactoring out common code
-fixing bracing & stuff to be compliant w/ Apache standards.
-more javadocs
-TODOs where there is potential trouble.
Next, I want to fix up handling of http response failures, so that clients can diagnose trouble better.

author: damitha
msg: PR:
Obtained from:
Submitted by:
Reviewed by:
log: Created a new Implementation of AxisConfig so that the server takes the
configuration path where the axiscpp.conf lies from the environment
variable AXIS_HOME. User has to set this variable pointing the
path to axiscpp.conf file. This axiscpp.conf file contains all the configuration paths
like wsdd configuration file path, axis log path etc.
